rules_text:
[i]Mend[/i] – Whenever another creature enters, you gain 1 life.
[i]Supporting Role[/i] – Whenever exactly two creatures you control attack one of your opponents, those creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Partner with Sakura, Supporting Cast [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Sakura into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
